name: Animated Circle
description:
This animation was built while exploring how lines behave in prototype. In the meanwhile, I discovered that lines are pretty costly for prototyping.

Updates

2022-06-10

2022-06-01

  • clean up the file a little
  • resized components
  • renamed file from "Simple O" to "Random Animation 001"
